comment: I had her for Bio II. This was one of the hardest teachers I have had here. Her study guide is barely helpful at all. I would totally understand if it was for Bio majors. She just doesn't do enough teaching of the actual material.

Course already hard its taxonomy 1/2 of it and she is hard.  guidlines useless, test vhard, labs Xlong, she is helpful if u talk to her. handouts are helpful but KNOW the details and how anything and everything is related! Good luck if you take her be ready to bust ur ass for any grade C or higher

A very hard professor, expects that you do NOTHING but study for her class. Handouts were massive, labs were very long, tough grader! She makes you feel very little and expects that you should know most of what she is teaching from Bio 2017. I would not recommend her to anyone, especially if you are not a biology major or any major having to do wit

Gives way too much material! YOU MUST have a good background in Biology 2107 to take this class, professor expects you to KNOW ALL Biology 2107 basics and then some. TOUGH class TOUGH professor!  The amount of material is overwhelming!

Massive amount of information covered. Ridiculously long lab. She is very clear what information is on the test. Read lecture notes, lab assignment, and book to do well on test. Her class is difficult to those who are not Bio majors, because the course is designed to cover every aspect of Biology.

I ended up getting a B in the class but the effort it took was incredible, and the boredom of her teaching along with her "try to make u feel like an idot" attitude wasnt worth it. I woodnt recomend her for anybody! BURNET PLEASE COME BACK!!!!!!!!
Great Professor.  Tests are hard and there is alot o f work but she is very fair.  Do the work and assignments and you will do well.  Pay attention to details.

Wonderful teacher. People complain cause she teaches a LOT of information and if you don't keep up you wont do as well. She gives quizzes from time to time but they aren't hard. She really wants you to know the information, and is always available for help. I thoroughly enjoyed the class--she actually challenges you, and thats nice to have for once
Absolutely terrible! Nitpicks to death! Quizzes all the time or something to turn in.  Makes you hate biology. What a shame and a waste!!!!  Many other problems, but no room to go into here.
Tries to make u feel stupid when u ask her a ? during class.
